PENEEEEEEEEE

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FavouritesService } from '../favourites.service'; import { TechDataService } from '../tech-data.service'; import { Album } from './Album'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-album', templateUrl: './album.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album.component.scss'] }) export class AlbumComponent implements OnInit { url = this.router.url; constructor(private favourites: FavouritesService, private dataService: TechDataService, private router: Router) { console.log(this.url); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getAll(); } getAll() { this.dataService.getAllAlbums().subscribe(albums => this.albums = albums); } albums: Album[] = []; addToCart(album: Album): void { this.favourites.addToCart2(album); } }
